pageContext.claim: “I never said the pandemic was a Hoax! Who would say such a thing? I said that the Do Nothing Democrats, together with their Mainstream Media partners, are the Hoax. They have been called out & embarrassed on this, even admitting they were wrong, but continue to spread the lie!”
pageContext.analysis: At a rally in South Carolina on Feb. 28, Trump referred to the coronavirus and said “this is their new hoax.”
